Actions.Name: Cleansing Bolt
Actions.Effects: Does not damage allies. Deals bonus damage for each ally caught in its area of effect.

Actions.Name: Cleansing Charm
Actions.Description: The [name] places a charm in a free space in range. An ally that ends their turn adjacent to the charm can consume it to cure themselves and fly 2.

Actions.Name: Empower Shield
Actions.Description: The [name] becomes immobile, but their aura of shielding increases to aura 2 and also grants cover from abilities used from outside the aura. They can exit this stance as an action.
